page.content: ,rather than cash.Incomes have added leaven to the dough,but have certainly not swamped the local population.Most local families have a {kinship network over about a 50 mile radius,which adds to the stability of life,and a relaxed and sociable atmosphere. {Staunton and Pembridge Landscape Landscape Rural Buildings Water Meadows Our {landscape }is{rurul }in an area of gently rolling hills, with many little lanes linking farms ,cottages,fields and orchards.The river Arrow flows through Stauntion and the {water meadows }alongside it are full of cattle among them, the famous red Herefords,especially drowned the East of Nake.Inlate summer and early autum the landscape is perticularly beautiful with a patchwork of pale stubble,golden
